about_the_game: Full throttle zombie wave-based survival. The world's first VIDEO GAME CONTROLLED LIVE ACTION ZOMBIE SERIES. Your actions make an impact on the show named the same title. We plan on taking you through a story telling experience as you have fun with friends and family killing hordes of zombies. There is a faction war happening between four factions known as, WITCH'S, BIKER'S, MARAUDER'S, AND HACKER'S. Upon starting your first game you will be asked what faction you plan on fighting for, but no worries, if you grow tired of one faction than you can switch to another whenever you may like. Through the faction war you will be at war with the other three factions as you push waves of zombie hordes away from your home , "NO MAN'S LAND". There will be Suprise live events as well as pvp game modes added to spice things up a bit between factions. We hope you enjoy the growing community of CRITICAL FAILURE.

content_descriptors.notes: This content is not meant to be sexual but can be takin however the person wants.

detailed_description: Full throttle zombie wave-based survival. The world's first VIDEO GAME CONTROLLED LIVE ACTION ZOMBIE SERIES. Your actions make an impact on the show named the same title. We plan on taking you through a story telling experience as you have fun with friends and family killing hordes of zombies. There is a faction war happening between four factions known as, WITCH'S, BIKER'S, MARAUDER'S, AND HACKER'S. Upon starting your first game you will be asked what faction you plan on fighting for, but no worries, if you grow tired of one faction than you can switch to another whenever you may like. Through the faction war you will be at war with the other three factions as you push waves of zombie hordes away from your home , "NO MAN'S LAND". There will be Suprise live events as well as pvp game modes added to spice things up a bit between factions. We hope you enjoy the growing community of CRITICAL FAILURE.

To the extent that statute or case law does not prohibit releases for ordinary negligence, this release is also for such negligence on the part of

I agree that this Release shall be governed for all purposes by California law, without regard to any conflict of law principles. This Release supersedes

In the event that any damage to equipment or facilities occurs as a result of my or my family's or my agent's willful actions, neglect or recklessness, I

THIS WAIVER AND RELEASE OF LIABILITY SHALL REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR THE DURATION OF MY PARTICIPATION IN THE
ACTIVITY, DURING THIS INITIAL AND ALL SUBSEQUENT EVENTS OF PARTICIPATION.

THIS AGREEMENT was entered into at arm's-length, without duress or coercion, and is to be interpreted as an agreement between two parties of

and effect. If a court should find that any provision of this agreement to be invalid or unenforceable, but that by limiting said provision it would
become valid and enforceable, then said provision shall be deemed to be written, construed and enforced as so limited.

I, THE UNDERSIGNED PARTICIPANT, AFFIRM THAT I AM OF THE AGE OF 18 YEARS OR OLDER, AND THAT I AM FREELY
SIGNING THIS AGREEMENT. I CERTIFY THAT I HAVE READ THIS AGREEMENT, THAT I FULLY UNDERSTAND ITS CONTENT

name: Critical Failure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10.
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Most computers will run this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is a simple wave-based zombie survival game. The world's first VIDEO GAME CONTROLLED LIVE ACTION SERIES. Be prepared to directly influence the world of CRITICAL FAILURE.
